CustomField.formula: IF( Total_Points__c > 0 && Total_Points__c < 200 , "SCOUT", IF( Total_Points__c >= 200 && Total_Points__c < 3000 , "HIKER", IF( Total_Points__c >= 3000 && Total_Points__c < 9000 , "EXPLORER", IF( Total_Points__c >= 9000 && Total_Points__c < 18000 , "ADVENTURER", IF( Total_Points__c >= 18000 && Total_Points__c < 35000 , "MOUNTAINEER", IF( Total_Points__c >= 35000 && Total_Points__c < 50000 , "EXPEDITIONER", IF( Total_Points__c >= 50000, "RANGER", "No Rank")))))))
CustomField.label: Rank
